original_text: But you have followed the ways of the kings of Israel, and you have led Judah and the people of Jerusalem to prostitute themselves, just as the house of Ahab did. You have also murdered your own brothers, members of your own family, men who were better than you.
korean_text: 오직 이스라엘 왕들의 길로 행하여 유다와 예루살렘 주민들이 음행하게 하기를 아합의 집이 음행하듯 하며 또 네 아비 집에서 너보다 착한 아우들을 죽였으니

sentences.original_text: But you have followed the ways of the kings of Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 당신은 이스라엘 왕들의 길을 따랐습니다

sentences.original_text: and you have led Judah and the people of Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 당신은 유다와 예루살렘 백성을 이끌었습니다
